nodes.text: The Metalorn garbage speeder was a type of speeder that was used on the planet Metalorn by the Techno Union to bring trash that had been sorted from the junk in the Wasteland to an unknown area. What happened to the trash is unknown.

The garbage speeder was an anti-gravity hovercraft that was painted yellow and had a large junk bin on its rear back that could hold a sizable amount of trash. The vehicle also sported the Metalorn crest on the back end on the bin. The speeder had room for one pilot and a passenger at the front of the vehicle.

Circa 19 BBY, Senator Bail Organa traveled to Metalorn to tour the world and find out how the operations on the planet were run. Earlier, Organa had duped the Foreman of the Techno Union, Wat Tambor, into thinking that Alderaan wanted to join the Confederacy of Independent Systems, as well as telling him that he wanted to convert Alderaan into a factory world like Metalorn, and wanted to receive a tour of the world. In reality, Organa was journeying to Metalorn to free the imprisoned Jedi Master Shaak Ti, who had been captured by the Techno Union. During the tour, Organa and company witnessed the Metalorn garbage speeders hard at work in the Wasteland of Metalorn.
